Articles.Content: OK, so apparently there is an experimental version of Interstellar that works in KSP 0.24. However, I have not been able to find this 'patch' anywhere--Google isn't turning up anything, and the forum search function is useless for such a popular mod. Can someone provide me a link to the thread? Thank you.

Delete ORS, WarpPlugin, and Treeloader before you install the experimental version. It works after that. I've been using it for 20-30 hours now.

https://github.com/WaveFunctionP/KSPInterstellar/releases
